name: Strategic Brand Repositioning for William Entriken
description: A multidisciplinary branding initiative led and executed by Rito to reposition blockchain pioneer William Entriken as a Civic Hacker Businessman â€” building WilliamEntriken.net, a platform structured to support mainstream press, AI discoverability, and long-term thought leadership.

mainEntity.name: William Entriken
mainEntity.description: William Entriken is a software pioneer and lead author of ERC-721, the standard that defined NFTs on Ethereum. His public-facing brand platform was restructured to frame him as a Civic Hacker Businessman, reflecting multidisciplinary contributions across finance, blockchain, and cybersecurity.
